DOC.HEADLINE: DEAL OF THE WEEK
DOC.TEXT: Jet Vacations , a subsidiary of Air France , is offering a winter package in Madrid from Jan . 3 to March 31 . Prices start at $ 879 and include round-trip air fare ( Monday through Thursday ) from LAX , six nights accommodations with continental breakfast , airport transfers , hotel taxes and service_charges and a half-day tour of Madrid . There is a $ 25 surcharge for Friday , Saturday and Sunday travel in either direction . There are no blackout dates . Rates are based on double occupancy and availability . For information and reservations , call ( 800 ) JET-0999.Free for the Asking Get_on the trail of the scenic West this winter on the now-complete Continental Divide Snowmobile Trail , running 370 miles from Lander , Wyo. , to West Yellowstone , Mont . The 30-mile stretch of the Grand Teton National_Park that completes the trail will open on an experimental basis this winter , from about January through March , depending_on conditions . The trail traverses open meadows and crosses Yellowstone_National_Park . A free map is available from the Wyoming Snowmobile Program , 2301 Central Ave. , Cheyenne , Wyo . 82002 ; ( 307 ) 777-7550 . This Week ' s Holidays Banking and government_offices will be closed or services curtailed in the following countries and their dependencies this week because of national and religious_holidays : Monday : Andorra , Aruba , Australia , Bahamas , Barbados , Belgium , Belize , Bermuda , Botswana , Brazil , British Virgin Is. , Brunei , Bulgaria , Canada , Cayman Is. , Cook Islands , Croatia , Cyprus , Czech Republic , Denmark , Estonia , Fiji , Finland , Germany , Ghana , Gibraltar , Greece , Grenada , Guam , Guyana , Honduras , Hong Kong , Hungary , Iceland , Ireland , Italy , Jamaica , Kenya , Kiribati , Latvia , Liberia , Liechtenstein , Macao , Malawi , Montserrat , Namibia , Netherlands , Neth .
